Texts.Eng: I have received coordinates for the ^orange;Miniknog Stronghold^reset;. ^green;Use the ship computer^reset; to access the location.

I'm afraid the ^orange;Apex artifact^reset; is being held in a ^orange;Miniknog stronghold^reset;. It may be hard to get access, dear. Please ^green;be careful down there^reset;, the Miniknog can be vicious.
I'm so pleased our band is growing; that we're gathering allies along with the artifacts. It's almost like starting a new Protectorate...
